sn48.13:1.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
sn48.13:1.5: Someone who has completed and fulfilled these five faculties is a perfected one. If they are weaker than that, they’re a non-returner … a once-returner … a stream-enterer … a follower of teachings … a follower by faith.
sn48.13:1.6: So from a disparity of faculties there’s a disparity of fruits. And from a disparity of fruits there’s a disparity of individuals.”
